content: Created `outputs/.gitkeep` to ensure the `./outputs/` directory remains present in version control as the canonical location for experiment artifacts.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('outputs/.gitkeep')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"# Intentionally left blank.\n# This file keeps the ./outputs directory tracked in git so experiments\n# can write canonical artifacts here (e.g., outputs/results.json, outputs/figure.png)."
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:outputs/.gitkeep')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created `outputs/.gitkeep` to ensure the `./outputs/` directory remains present in version control as the canonical location for experiment artifacts.
